data.text: We stayed for 10 nights the pool is very nice and warm,good location,rooms are nice and clean,staff are very helpful and kind just one issue the food is most of the time cold and not alot to choose from and not very nice overall its not a bad hotel (there are also loads of Russians).
data.title: Good hotel.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest, 

Thank you for choosing Atana Hotel during your stay with us.  

It was very good of you to take the time to write to us with your constructive feedback in such a detailed manner highlighting the pros and cons of your experience at the hotel.

Thank you for mentioning positive elements about the hotel.

Please accept my sincere apologies for the areas in which we fell short. Rest assured that your comments are well-received and duly noted.

Our team will certainly look forward to your future stay with us when we will spare no effort to ensure another pleasant stay.

Warm regards,
Atana Hotel
owner_response.author: Atana Hotel

data.text:
Hôtel well situated.
Rooms are spacious and clean.
Fridges did not work
Big swimming pool with lots of space to seat and lie
Food is good but a little  repetitive and breakfast and dinner times are so  busy.
Staff were really friendly and doing a good job
data.title: Nice experience

data.text:
Having stayed in Dubai several times, I have to say this hotel falls short in certain aspects.
The pool is located on a terrace between the two hotel buildings and is mainly on the shade throughout the day. This also means the sun loungers around the edge of the pool are often in the shade too.
There is a large terrace which also has loungers but again we often found that wherever you sat there was a fair bit of shade through the day. 
As there are two hotel buildings and the terrace is in between, this creates a wonderful tunnel which isn’t the most pleasant environment in which to sunbathe.
Aside from this, the food was great and varied each day and on the whole, the staff were very helpful.
Tip for travellers: download the Careem app for taxi bookings. We did and it was super easy!
data.title: Average hotel. Have stayed in better

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest, 

Thank you for choosing Atana Hotel during your stay with us. 

We strive to provide a superior service experience for every customer and we are glad that your overall stay was to your expectation including our team's great hospitality and services. 

We have shared your feedback with the team as this will serve as an encouragement to them to continue delivering great services to our valued guests. 

Warm regards, 
Atana Hotel
owner_response.author: Atana Hotel

data.text: Very beautiful hotel i want to tank charvith the home cleaner was very kind person and helpful and i want to thank the hall staff i was blessed from the staff and its helpful ways and the hotel is so beautiful from inside and excellent room a very good hotel
data.title: Excellent hotel

data.text:
Well located, clean and comfortable. The staff were helpful and friendly particular thank you to Gomaa for always securing a local taxi for myself and my colleague.
The WiFi was good throughout the hotel, ideal for working in the room or reception areas.
data.title: Business trip
